text.text_translated:
Faith47 is from Cape Town, South Africa.  
She paints big, bright pictures of people and animals.  
She likes to explore different places.  
Her pictures are on pavements, in empty factories, and on abandoned cars.  
Street art is art made on public walls or streets.  
Most street art does not last long.  
Weather or city cleaners will soon take it away.  
For her, this shows that life changes, ending and starting again.
